body:
Chris, Mostapha,
I also have the most recent version of radiance installed, v4.3., when I was getting the strange results. It has to do with the gendaymtx, the old one (19kb) takes a little longer in calculating the sky, the new one (21kb) seems to skip some passes as it seems to calculate (to) fast. Thanks guys and have a nice weekend we have an hour extra :)
